Hello [Joan Gao],

I came across your profile and was impressed by your impressive skills in frontend, backend, and cloud technologies. I'm a junior software engineer at UTS, currently studying Computer Science with a major in Artificial Intelligence, and I'm passionate about building software that's clean, useful, and human-centered.

I noticed that we have similar technical interests, including full-stack development, AI integration, and backend design. Your experience with project tools like Git, Jira, Figma, and PowerBI caught my attention, as I'm also interested in exploring these tools further.

I would love to connect with you, as I'm currently looking to collaborate on AI + backend projects, and I believe that your expertise would be invaluable to me. Let's exchange ideas and see if we can create something amazing together!

Best,
[Your Name]
